resources.string: Button to go from Info Activity to Options Activity
The camera flash can be ON, OFF, AUTOMATIC or ALWAYS ON, depending on your needs of light.

Take a picture averaging multiple consecutive frames.\nThe number of frames to average in a single picture can be set in the settings.\nThe final resolution may be lower than the maximum supported by the camera sensor.

Start a timer to take a photo when a person is detected.\nThe notification sound, that can be turned on or off in the settings, notifies when a person is detected.\nHint: it is useful when you want to take a photo of yourself but you are alone.
Take better picture in low light condition. It can be ON, OFF or AUTOMATIC, which activates the mode automatically in low light conditions.
Enhance the visual quality of your images by expanding the range of brightness and color.
Highlight the subject by making the background blurred.
Enhances facial appearance by applying smoothing, skin tone correction, and blemish removal during image capture..
